titleStmt.title: A Catalogue of books of the newest fashion to be sold by auction at the Whiggs Coffee-House, at the sign of the jackanapes in Prating-Alley, near the deanry of St. Paul's.

notesStmt.note: An attack on William Sherlock and other members of the clergy who took the oath.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
